title: Istanbul: The Swiss Hotel Bosphorous' Rooms With The Best View Of The Famous Waterway
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Latest News - Today 
If you name your hotel after a major body of water, it's a tell, as they say in poker. The rooms to get are the ones that have a water view....
